Investigate the origins and history of t.title: Python (programming language) - Wikipedia
Investigate the origins and history of t.summary: Python was conceived in the late 1980s by Guido van Rossum at Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica (CWI) in the Netherlands.
key_points: Conceived in the late 1980s by Guido van Rossum
Started as a successor to the ABC programming language
Released in 1991 as Python 0.9.0

Investigate the origins and history of t.title: The Origins of Python: A Journey Through Its History and Evolution
Investigate the origins and history of t.summary: Python was created by Guido van Rossum, a Dutch programmer who started the project in December 1989 as a hobby.
key_points: Created by Guido van Rossum in December 1989
Inspirated by the ABC programming language
Named after the British comedy group Monty Python

Investigate the origins and history of t.title: The Origins of Python | Lambert Meertens - Inference
Investigate the origins and history of t.summary: Python was designed by Guido van Rossum and has become wildly popular since an inconspicuous public release in 1991.
key_points: Designed by Guido van Rossum
Publicly released in 1991

Investigate the origins and history of t.title: History of Python Programming Language - TutorialsPoint
Investigate the origins and history of t.summary: Python was developed by Guido van Rossum in the late 1980s and early nineties at the National Research Institute for Mathematics and Computer Science in the Netherlands.
key_points: Developed by Guido van Rossum in the late 1980s
Derived from many other languages including ABC, Modula-3, C, and SmallTalk

Investigate the origins and history of t.title: Python Wasn't Built in a Day: An Origin Story Worth Knowing
Investigate the origins and history of t.summary: Python was derived from its predecessor, a project called ABC, and was designed to be human-friendly rather than computationally efficient.
key_points: Derived from the ABC project
Designed to be human-friendly and not computationally efficient
